gobblin.metrics.kafka

Class KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.kafka.KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type
    S - schema type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfluentKafkaSchemaRegistry, KafkaAvroSchemaRegistry, SimpleKafkaSchemaRegistry

    public abstract class KafkaSchemaRegistry<K,S>
extends Object
    A abstract schema registry class for Kafka, which supports fetching schema by key, fetching the latest schema of a topic, and registering a schema.

      • getSchemaByKey

        public S getSchemaByKey(K key)
                 throws SchemaRegistryException
        Get schema from schema registry by key.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if failed to get schema by key.

      • fetchSchemaByKey

        protected abstract S fetchSchemaByKey(K key)
                               throws SchemaRegistryException
        Fetch schema by key. This method is called in #getSchemaByKey(K) to fetch the schema if the given key does not exist in the cache.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if failed to fetch schema by key.

      • getLatestSchemaByTopic

        public abstract S getLatestSchemaByTopic(String topic)
                                  throws SchemaRegistryException
        Get the latest schema of a topic.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if failed to get schema by topic.

      • register

        public abstract K register(S schema)
                    throws SchemaRegistryException
        Register a schema to the schema registry
        Returns:
        the key of the registered schema.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if registration failed.

      • register

        public abstract K register(S schema,
                           String name)
                    throws SchemaRegistryException
        Register a schema to the schema registry under the given name
        Returns:
        the key of the registered schema.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if registration failed.
